body_html:
So it does work right before that commit? I thought you couldn't bisect.

Can you try copying the "defines=" from //tensorflow/core:lib_internal to //tensorflow/core:lib_internal_impl (or just wait a bit because I have a commit which will sync and do that)? Defines were not applied to .cc files in that commit. That's the only difference I know of when building with --config=monolithic.

body:
So it does work right before that commit? I thought you couldn't bisect.

Can you try copying the "defines=" from //tensorflow/core:lib_internal to //tensorflow/core:lib_internal_impl (or just wait a bit because I have a commit which will sync and do that)? Defines were not applied to .cc files in that commit. That's the only difference I know of when building with --config=monolithic.
